overview: Threshold are one of the leading lights of the progressive metal scene. Now celebrating twenty years together, Threshold continue to make powerful and innovative rock music both on record and on stage.  1.- Phenomenon 2.- Oceanbound 3.- Choices 4.- Angels 5.- Falling Away 6.- Virtual Isolation 7.- Innocent 8.- Long Way Home 9.- Fragmentation 10.- Clear 11.- Lifeflow 12.- Narcissus 13.- Sunseeker 14.- The Latent Gene 15.- Light And Space 16.- Sunrise On Mars 17.- Paradox 18.- Sanity's End
title: Threshold: Critical Energy
